other_title: Detective Conan: El caso del francotirador dimensional (Spanish)
Detetive Conan: O Mistério do Atirador de Elite (Portuguese)
名偵探柯南 異次元的狙擊手 (Chinese (Taiwan))
名探偵コナン 異次元の狙撃手（スナイパー） (Japanese)
plot: A vicious sniper has appeared in Tokyo, rendering the people too scared to go outside, once again it's up to Conan to figure out the meaning behind the killings and capture the mysterious sniper before more lives are lost.
